name: Car Flag 2
description:
Do you have enough patience to finish this hard challenge ?

Drive into one of the most painful games you will play !!

-Different Gameplay Styles.

-Different Themes.

-Harder Levels.

-New Endless Mode Coming Soon...

Note: Since this was an old project (My First One), There wasn't much attention given to the graphic design as much as the gameplay.

Overall it's a fun game that requires trial and error.

-This game is free on android but includes ads and it doesn't perform well as it does on PC, So I highly recommend the PC version instead of android.

-The following screenshots are from the mobile version but the game is the exact same on pc just without the virtual arrow buttons and no bugs :)

-Official Website: www.AhmedoElgamal.ga
